title: Gas Cylinder Blast in one of the side street stalls near Noida Sector 75 [OC]
selftext: Ther were around 3-4 cylinders at that spot. Thankfully no one got hurt and there was a fire hydrant near it. The people there extinguished before the police and the fire truck arrived.
comments:
This is exactly the reason there are regulations for what can be done in the open and what shouldn’t. 

Having such facilities in such close proximity to vehicles and pedestrians will result in tragedy.
Agreed. These shops are illegal as that area is not theirs or rented. Police had already cleared all of them last year but few months after they came back.
bro fire hydrant near by?? is it provided by the civic authority or any private residential society?
"मैं नाली के गैस को इस्तेमाल करता था"
read the question, who installed it? muncipal corporation or ur society?

Im not sure exactly, but most likely my society as the land is owned by the society. Leaving that, read my other other comment, the police demolished all the illegal shops. I have attached a pic with it.
